name: covid19_stats
shortDescription: Application for Viewing daily COVID-19 Statistics of India & can find the available vaccine centers of a given pin-code. COVID-19 case-data & case-time-series is provided by Ministry of Health and Family Welfare, Government of India.
longDescription: Application for Viewing daily COVID-19 Statistics of India & can find the available vaccine centers of a given pin-code. COVID-19 case-data & case-time-series is provided by Ministry of Health and Family Welfare, Government of India.
